label: 護摩
本: State of War: the Violent Order of Fourteenth Century Japan . Michigan University Press . 2003
説明文: Sticks with prayers inscribed on them, to be offered to the wisdom king deities, such as Fudō, or Aisen. Prayers would be burned in an alter in front of the deities. See also godanhō and chōbukuhō. [不動、愛染、五壇法、調伏法]
